titles.title: To provide for additional safeguards with respect to imposing Federal mandates, and for other purposes.
Unfunded Mandates Information and Transparency Act of 2019
Unfunded Mandates Information and Transparency Act of 2019
Unfunded Mandates Information and Transparency Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, and in addition to the Committees on the Budget, Rules, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
